reviewText: great info if you are going to do this

Excellent video. Art gives clear concise instruction on bedding the M1A. Books containing this level of instruction cost twice as much without the added benefit of seeing the steps demonstrated. All though Art uses a drill press to route the stock for bedding these task can be accomplished with a chisels or a Dremel tool as Art states in his video. The video is an excellent resource for anyone wishing to learn to glass bed the M1a. Anyone with basic tools and some mechanical aptitude with practice will become proficient at glass bedding.
Really good procedures. Sub minute groups with a Polyteck after the glass bedding using LC LR (not even my super-anal handloads).
This was a waste of money and time.  The level of recording was amateurish and the quality of the instruction was poor.  I would not recommend this to anyone.
This video lacks a clear, methodical approach to glass bedding a your M1A stock.  A book with pictures would be a lot more useful and go much more into depth.

Too much money for a home made video!
Art ist using professional gunsmithing machines - the amateur uses what?
